website_summaries.verdict: Excellent construction with wheels for mobility. Can remove wheels to create a  gentle rocking crib.
pros: All wood frame with CARB II support for mattress
Nice feature with locking wheels that also can be removed
Perfect size for small apartments or for visiting grandchildren
cons: Some potential issues with stability of crib with wheels off

customer_reviews.title: My crib was missing parts, and the company has sent me a bill for the cost of the part + shipping
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely dumbfounded by DaVinci's (part of the Million Dollar Baby company) customer service. The crib that I received was missing the "rock stop", which is sort of a kick stand that keeps the crib from leaning to one side when you aren't actively rocking it. I went through the trouble of notifying the company that my brand new product was missing parts, and they just sent me a bill, requiring that I pay both for the part and for shipping! I will be returning the crib, as I have no interest in doing business with a company that would treat a customer in this way.
customer_reviews.author: BrownEyedGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib. I purchased this on sale with a coupon for a total of $90.00. I would not spend full price on it though due to the fact that you will have to purchase a mattress as the mattress that is included is simply not great and flimsy. I opted for the "dream on me 3in" mattress. Fits great without any gaps. The crib is easy to assemble. Love the rocking option. Does come with wheels as well. Perfect for small spaces. The grey looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Maria W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this. Fits in our small bedroom in our small apartment, has easy assembly, it's sturdy and stable, it's a great height for next to our bed, and it rolls easily out into the living room when we want baby to nap out there. We're using the Newton Wovenaire mini crib mattress with it, and the mattress fits perfectly - no gap in the sides at all, and although you do have to shove it in there a bit, the design of the mattress means you just get a very snug fit without any bunching or billowing or other distortion of the mattress at all.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small apartment
customer_reviews.text: This crib was my favorite. It lasted two years before the frame started to crack from my now toddler’s constant jumping. I loved the rocking feature when he was a newborn as I could literally rock him back to sleep without getting out of bed. The size was perfect for my one bedroom apartment. It fit through doorways which full size cribs don’t. I would sometimes wheel the crib into my family room and it would double as a small playpen as my little one grew. It is with great sadness that I am now done with this crib because it was so perfect for my first child.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this mini crib
customer_reviews.text: I love this mini crib. I needed something to save space and this did the trick. Love how it rocks. It's also very cute. I did buy the 5" crescent mattress to go with this. The "mattress" that it comes with is useless in my opinion. Other pros: it fits through doorways, it has attachments you flip downto keep it from rocking, there are wheels you can attach or detach, it is light and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: M_Fam

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product details
customer_reviews.text: I’m quite irritated about the maximum weight recommendation being listed as 50 pounds on Amazon, when the instruction booklet clearly says the weight limit is only 17.5 pounds. I never would have purchased this if that detail was listed accurately.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Missing wheels
customer_reviews.text: The wheels were advertised, but not included in the box. Very upset, as they were one of the deciding features why we got this crib and our daughter is due very soon, so this is not the best time to deal with these issues. Contacted the company and will change the rating if they resolve this quickly and competently. *Edit: after filling out the form on their website, the manufacturer acted promptly and shipped the missing wheels, which we received within a few weeks. I'm changing my rating from 1 to 4 stars. We have yet to use the crib, so there may be another update after it gets some use.
customer_reviews.author: DC BOS

customer_reviews.title: High quality mini crib
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib so far. We live in a 2 bedroom with our newborn and older child, so the baby is in our room for now. I liked that this is a certified green crib, so we didn’t have to worry about toxic off-gassing. We are using it with the wheels on, so eventually we can relocate the crib to other room easily. We also ordered the dream on me 3 inch mini crib mattress, and that fits in this crib perfectly, FYI!! Baby slept in crib for first time last night and did great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This crib was super easy to assemble. Took me 30 minutes from the time I started reading the instructions until the time it was fully assembled. I highly recommend using a power screwdriver (not a drill) to speed up the process. Assembly time is at least twice as long by hand screwdriver. Pieces were clearly labeled and diagram visually accurate. One recommendation would be to assemble crib on its side instead of the upright position. Crib is sturdy but not overly heavy
customer_reviews.author: Sadie P

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive! Portable, beautiful and easy to assemble!!
customer_reviews.text: The bottom part of side rail has a crack. But other than that i’m impressed! White is beautiful matching our apartment walls. I like that I can easily roll the crib from our master’s bedroom to our sun room. Most of all the rocking mechanism is fantastic! except that taking out the casters need a lot of force to pull out. I used dream on me 3” mattress and it fits well with no gaps! i’m so happy with my purchase and will highly recommend for people who doesn’t have big spaces at home.
customer_reviews.author: Dianella

customer_reviews.title: Rib is nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Rib is nice and sturdy. Easy to put together. Feels well manufactured and deeper than most porta cribs. I give it a 3 because there is NO teething guard and that was important to me. One reason I picked this over dream on me crib. I contacted customer service direct and there was no way to fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Charlson family

customer_reviews.title: Only has lower mattress settings
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a nice little crib, no funny smells, but we were disappointed to find that it only came with 3 mattress settings (which all seemed too for newborn) compared with the 4 pictured and described when we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The mattress that comes with it is great...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 month old baby due to her growing out of the bassist type thing we had and it’s perfect. I bought it in slate. It’s beautiful. Sturdy. And she loves rocking motion. Pictured is with the mattress that came with it and personally I think it’s fine. She slept in it fine. I ordered another mattress that was unnecessary but kept it due to hassle of returning. The pack n play fitted sheets by parents choice fit it perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Bee Correa

customer_reviews.title: *It scratched very easily. *Baby started chewing on the wood and even ...
customer_reviews.text: Cons: *It scratched very easily. *Baby started chewing on the wood and even with two tiny teeth, it looked like a beaver had chewed into it. Not only was it extremely ugly, but we were worried about our baby's safety. *Only two of the wheels lock. *The lock levers are flimsy. *The packaging was missing one washer and one bolt. Pros: *Inexpensive *Easy to move between rooms *Different heights was helpful (though it was a hassle to move it down because the board falls and scratches the wood when you unscrew it--you need two people to adjust)
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Nice crib for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I needed a crib to fit in our master bedroom and this one fit the bill perfectly. The crib is sturdy and compact. I’ve used the crib for 5 months so far and it has held up with daily use. The two downsides are the gold casters are a bit gaudy/feel cheap and the expresso color is more of a cherry color. I would purchase the crib again!
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Defective part, very slow customer service
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with defective nut, pictured here. The nut was not even threaded at all. Contacted company for replacement, and they said it would take 10-14 days to arrive. One. Single. Nut. 10-14 days. Even if the company shipped this in a standard envelope, it would take far less than that to cross the contiguous United States. Which means customer service for defective orders is lacking. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wolstein

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift from a friend. Was looking for a small crib to fit in my master bedroom. This fits perfectly into a little nook I have for baby boy. It was super easy to assemble I did it all myself. Comes with a thin mattress pad so you’ll have to get a mattress but, it’s the best deal for the price. I just bought the dream on me mini mattress and topped it with the mattress topper it came with. Baby boy loves the rocking feature!
customer_reviews.author: Babycakes

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for over a year and a half. It is lightweight, narrow enough to fit through the door so it can be moved easily to another room. It is holding up well with regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Orange Tree

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service, but plan on buying a different mattress
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the crib in the "honey oak" stain and unfortunately had to return it due to manufacture's defect that prevented a complete assembly, and there was a hole in the mattress pad. The mattress pad is totally unacceptable for long term use - it's a thin pad of cheap foam wrapped in vinyl lining. The stain was really golden and kind of yellow, didn't impress in person. I will say the customer service in coordinating the return was excellent and UPS picked up the package within 12 hours at NO cost to me! Awesome in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: mother of two

customer_reviews.title: Best bedside crib
customer_reviews.text: Best bedside crib ever! I bought 2 for upstairs and downstairs for her day naps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute crib. Seems much smaller than a regular sized pack n' play. We purchased a pack n' play mattress for the crib and the mattress is very, very snug. Looking back wish I would've bought standard size crib.
customer_reviews.author: FC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful investment!
customer_reviews.text: Our friends researched earnestly for the best crib to have at their home when their grandchildren arrived. The DaVinci Alpha Mini Rocking Crib was their choice. Knowing how thoroughly they research EVERYTHING, I bought it also (taking their suggestion) and was extremely pleased. It arrived within a couple of days!! The quick arrival was such a surprise. We needed it for our little grandson's arrival at Christmas holiday. The assembly was easy. The light-colored wood is beautiful and the wood is so smoothly polished to the touch. It rolls from room to room with ease. The size is perfect. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: judgment as the noonday

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib!
customer_reviews.text: This crib is high quality and perfect for tiny spaces. I love that it has wheels. I pull it right up next to my bed to use it as a co-sleeper, and then push it away in the morning so I can still make the bed easily. Baby is 4 months old and huge (20 pounds) and still fits in it well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mini Crib
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib! We have had no issues with it and our kid, now one, sleeps very well in it. It was easy to assemble and has held up well. We highly recommend this crib to anyone looking for a mini crib. We expected the mattress it came with to be flimsy and purchased the dream on me 5 mattress to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt take much space and very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Im loving this crib. Easy assembly and It doesnt take up much space. A crib wwith wheels is great, we can wheel it to the living room when we need to.
customer_reviews.author: Hamz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mini crib
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mini crib, super fast delivery, super easy to assemble, easy to move around from room to room. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: This has been the perfect option for keeping my son in our room once ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been the perfect option for keeping my son in our room once he grew out of the co-sleeper bassinet. It was easy to put together, is quite durable and can be lowered to a safe level pretty easily when your baby starts pulling up. His larger crib in his nursery is also a DaVinci product and we've been quite happy with their furniture to date. Small footprint means that it doesn't take up a huge amount of space. Great value for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini Crib
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cherry finish and it looks really nice. The mini crib is the perfect size if your just looking for a small crib. Easy to put together and nothing arrived damaged. I was worried that it wasn't going to have all its parts. But it was all there. I bought the Dream on me 3 portable crib mattress with this purchase. It fits perfect in the mini crib if you're looking for a mattress with no springs. My opinion? This was a great buy. Plus this crib can rock which is a great feature. Love this crib. Very happy buyer. ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It is not Espresso color at all!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little crib BUT it is not Espresso at all. Looks like cherry wood. Light. I wanted to send it back but I needed it so bad and didn't have time. Just be aware that it is not dark espresso brown/black at all! Misleading
customer_reviews.author: book_reader

customer_reviews.title: I love this crib
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib. My daughter went from a co-sleeper to this, and at 19 months old, she is still in it. We never used the rocking feature, as she was too old for that by the time we put her in it. I doubt we will have to buy a regular sized crib; she will likely go from this to a toddler bed when she is ready. She is on the lowest setting right now, and is in no danger of being able to climb out. I did get a thicker mattress for it based on reviews here, and repurposed the very thin one as a dog bed- it fit perfectly into my beast's bed cover!
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great with our limited space. I love that it can be moved from one room to another, this has really come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for a newborn!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy but light and a good sized crib. I didn't want to buy any of those plastic pack and plays and didn't want to get the humongous cribs either (babies look so small and un-cozy in them) and therefore got this for the baby. She seems to love it (for now:-/) and will nap in it for a period of three hours continuously. It was really easy to put together even for my husband who is a novice at fixing things!!! I would definitely recommend it for its price.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: perfect size, it's portability ability is amazing (easily rolled ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect size, it's portability ability is amazing (easily rolled from one room to another), love the option of being able to rock. It came very well packaged and it took my husband and I less than 10 minutes to put together. Love it. My son will be able to use this crib until he's at least 1 1/2 or maybe older. Right now he's a big 3 month old and he has plenty of room. Very happy with my purchase. Would recommend to anyone who wants their baby to sleep in the same room for a while or until they decide which crib set to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: madsam

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable heights, easily moves about on wheels, nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are in our 70's and we bought this for our newborn grand daughter. On wheels it is wonderful if we have to move it. The adjustable height takes a bit of doing with a screwdriver but once at the level you want, it's perfect. It can be lowered at different heights so will last until the baby is ready for a regular bed. It's cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo lady

customer_reviews.title: She sleeps like a baby ;) ...Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little crib. It was exactly as described on Amazon, arrived quickly, was very easy to assemble. And my grand daughter loves it. Used a different mattress with it. (Kolcraft Cozy Soft Portable Crib Mattress, stacked it on top of the mattress that came with the crib.) With the mattress set to the lowest setting, there's no worries of the little one trying to climb out of it. Used the wheels and didn't opt for the rocking feature. We love this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use in our room to make night time nursing easier but this could easily be a full time crib until I'd say about 18 months then it might be a little small. It's very sturdy, the finish is nice, and it arrived in excellent condition. I did buy another mattress for it but am using the foam mattress that came with it in the bottom of the pack n play. This is the same size as a pack n play and you can use your pack n play sheets.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I love the wheels and I can't imagine living without them. Very handy when u need to love the crib from bedroom to living room every day. Very durable especially at that price. The mattresses is not as bad as people in the reciews make it sound. I mean it's free what do you want more??? The only thing I hated is how hard it is to find accessory such as mattresses and/or bumpers/fitted sheets.
customer_reviews.author: mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Great crib!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 19 month old daughter, and it is wonderful. This is a wonderful space saver!! Very easy to assemble, and a well made product. I will be purchasing a second one for my 6 week old son. I have a small home, which I share with my mother, 3 children, four dogs, and 2 cats, and every bit of extra space counts. I just wish I could find the proper sized bedding for it that doesn't cost a fortune. In the meantime, I just use standard crib sized sheets, and pin them underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Klangosh

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product
customer_reviews.text: The instructions could’ve been better. It was easy to assemble based on common sense because it’s not many parts to it. I love the crib itself. Simple and cute for my baby’s room
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth kelshall

customer_reviews.title: very nice crib
customer_reviews.text: good sturdy crib. love everything about it! compact, easy to roll around the apartment, adjustable height and very cute. we did not use it as a rocking crib, my son did not like the rocking but i was very happy to find crib that i can use instead of bassinette and co-sleeper until my son was 1 year old and we switched to full size bed. *** my son was 97 percentile and would not fit in the crib after the first year, for smaller children this will work until 18-24 months.
customer_reviews.author: ajvar od

customer_reviews.title: Darling!
customer_reviews.text: Put this together the other day and I love it! So much nicer in person then the picture,the espresso color is a nice dark brown and looks very sweet with the pink bedding we got. Easy to put together,light,rocks nicely. Quality seems good it has only been set up a couple weeks but it seems sturdy and does not seem to scuff easily. I had no problem fitting standard size crib bedding on it with a little tucking and folding. Perfect for us and can't wait to put my new baby in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: the build quality is excellent. If you're planning on using this in a ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the build quality is excellent. If you're planning on using this in a static configuration (no rocking) on hardwood flooring, I recommend that you use the casters instead of the provided metal stands. The stands for my particular crib were slightly off so there was a bit of wobbling and subsequent knocking noises. You could also remedy this with with some padding. The included pad is decent and firm, so you may consider a thicker pad as well depending on your baby's needs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: We love this crib!
customer_reviews.text: When my son outgrew his bassinett, we weren't sure what to do...I wasn't ready to put him in his big crib in the nursery yet. We ordered this mini crib and we love it. It was easy to put together, and fits through the doorways of our small apartment so we can easily move it from room to room. I would say that you definitely need to order a crib mattress for it if you are going to be using it every night. It only comes with a little 1" mattress which is pretty useless. We ordered this mattress and it fits perfectly:
customer_reviews.author: kristen spina

customer_reviews.title: The price is right
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, more sturdy than it looks and is so easy to put together. It took about 20 mins to assemble. Be careful with the metal corners when you put them on, they will scratch the wood if you scrape it by accident while trying to line up the holes. Comes with teething rails, which was a nice surprise. Baby is on the way, can't wait to see how she fits in it. The mattress it comes with is nothing more than a thin plastic pad, so purchase a good one! The frame alone is worth every penny =)
customer_reviews.author: ColeMc3

customer_reviews.title: Love our new crib
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this review was a must! I searched high and low for a MINI CRIB and found this one! It came in in great condition and its the perfect size! Not huge like a regular size crib! Very sturdy and so easy to out together! If your in search for a mini crib I totally recommend this one! 🙌
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, I love it because I can use the rocking feature. There are two metal feet at the bottom of the crib that you can use to keep the bed stationary when you do not want it to rock. As mentioned in other reviews, you cannot use the rocking feature if you decide to attach the rollers at the bottom of the crib. The base of the rocker can be moved up or down 2-3 levels to adjust the height. I currently have it in the highest position because my son cannot stand up in it yet, I will lower it when he begins to stand or prop himself up.
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Great crib, but buy the mattress
customer_reviews.text: My baby would not sleep in a pack n play at grandma's house or in our bedroom and we bought this to try with the mattress they sell separately. This crib is well made and the ability to rock is really nice. My baby is now out of our bed and in this crib with no issues. I highly recommend the davinci mattress they make for this crib though and not the little pad that this comes with. Easy to assemble and good quality wood.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mini Crib
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Came without any imperfections and was very simple to set up. Slate grey looks even more beautiful in person.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE FOR BREASTFEEDING MAMAS.
customer_reviews.text: Regular cribs, bassinets, & Moses carriers really suck compare to this. It works for newborns until 24 months for avg baby. Newborns kick and make the crib rock lightly. Use crib rail wraps and it is perfect with lots of air flow and cushiony protection when baby rolls. Easy to roll thru doors, rocks easily, and is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: DI

customer_reviews.title: Small crib, perfect choice for limited living space
customer_reviews.text: The simple design of this crib, plus the compact size of this crib was the winning factor for my purchase. The bottom of the crib is adjustable(3 settings) , so it can be pushed lower as the baby grows. It can be turned into a rocking bed by adjusting the clips on the bottom of crib legs. It is somewhat expensive, but there are not a lot of choices for a small crib out there anyway. The cheaper cribs require a Texas sized house.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for smaller spaces or moving baby around
customer_reviews.text: Needed a "moveable" crib for our vacation condo - baby doesn't get own room. This is perfect. Can roll him through doors while asleep and it's great. He's a big 14mos old now Nd it still fits him. Bought the 3" spring coil mini mattress Nd he sleeps just as soundly as in his e pensive crib and mattress at home!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Espresso is lighter than pictured
customer_reviews.text: I wanted espresso but it was more like a cherry, I didn’t put it together so I can’t comment on quality.
customer_reviews.author: Meener

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shower Wish List Item!💙
customer_reviews.text: Ordered & delivered to my God Daughter expecting a baby boy in April. She had it on her wish list & loves it! Just make sure when ordering the crib-mattress doesn't come included so I had to order mattress separately!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: excellent ... I liked everything except one, the degree of swing is not big. if the baby is crying, you cannot rock her so that he calms down :) but we solved the problem by turning the cradle upside down. it can be put upside down and you can rock the cradle stronger :)
customer_reviews.author: Sino

customer_reviews.title: Great Space Saver!!
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom is very small and this mini crib fit perfectly. My baby loved it in spite of her being a bad sleeper. Was easy to assemble and although my baby dislikes the rocking option, she loved the crib itself.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love this cute crib
customer_reviews.text: This is the crib you need if you live in a small place. We live in a 1 bedroom apt. And this fit perfectly next to my bedside. Recomend this crib instead of a co sleeper or a basinet which baby will outgrow too fast out of. Very easy to put together and easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this crib
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib. Needed something to fit next to my bed since I wasn't ready for my daughter to be in her own room. I really liked that I could reach over and rock the crib without having to get out of bed. She is now 1 and it is in her room and she still uses it and it still has plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Mdjd8080

customer_reviews.title: Awesome crib.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome crib, actually have 2 of them and for the price they cant be beat. They come with a mattress but opted to purchase thicker ones anyways. It has wheels as well as ability to rock. There are 4 height adjustments so it is very versatile. Best feature is that it is small enough to fit through doorways and very light yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tomasina Parr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We live in a small apartment and this crib fits the bill. It is very sturdy and cute. We love it! My daugther is 3 months now and I think she will fit in it at least until she is 18 months old. Anyway, I don't keep my baby for too long in their crib... I orinally bought a 3'' extra firm matress from Dream on me but actually now only use the one that came with the crib. It is not too thin.
customer_reviews.author: emilie_d

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compact, modern crib
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 month old loves this crib. The rocking feature is great (though there are stops attached if you want to disable it). I love the multi-level feature. The only thing is we bought a different, thicker mattress. Overall, very happy with this purchase: it's a perfect, safe crib for our NYC apartment.
customer_reviews.author: OptimisticPancake

customer_reviews.title: Good but missing newborn setting
customer_reviews.text: It seems great so far. Just got it and put it together today. It seems study and I like the rocking feature. Only thing I noticed was I looked at a lot of the pictures in the reviews and liked that they had a newborn setting but the one I got did not. It starts less than half way down, which is a bummer with a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Those darned stickers!!
customer_reviews.text: Please, will someone let me know how they removed the warning stickers from both ends of the crib? So far, I have tried warm water which removed the paper but left sticky residue. I then tried vinegar, olive oil, rubbing alcohol, Murphy's Oil Soap, dish deterrent and toothpaste without success. The crib is nice but I am stumped. Help!
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ann Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love this crib
customer_reviews.text: Perfect when you are limited on space. My 2 year old twins are still using theirs, I will transition them to a bigger crib soon but you can use for about 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Great mini crib
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib. We live in a place where sq ft is a luxury. So this works great for us. We wheel it from room to room and use it within tight quarters. I haven't used the rocking portion of it so I can't review that. I did purchase the larger mattress and the hardest part was finding a sheet for it. I did find the babyletto sheets fit the best over all others.
customer_reviews.author: stateyzell

customer_reviews.title: For a small space it's perfect, but the base doesn't stay stable enough when ...
customer_reviews.text: For a small space it's perfect, but the base doesn't stay stable enough when not in 'rocking' mode and my daughter doesn't stay asleep in it for long. She doesn't like to feel unstable and that wakes her up almost every time she moves!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a nice coil mattress
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product for the price. Buy a nice coil mattress. Instructions state up to 5" mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, best value for price!
customer_reviews.text: After comparison I bought this and now after one month I think it’s the perfect choice! Best value for its price, very sturdy and good quality. Haven’t used the rocking function, have been using the movable function and it’s so convenient! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: I love this crib
customer_reviews.text: I love this crib! I tried to use the rocking feature but my baby is nine months and holding onto the railing, so it was too unsteady for him. However, I can gently rock the crib with the wheels on to help him back to sleep, which is nice. This would have been the best crib when he was little though! I wish I had bought it sooner! I wish I hadn't bought the white finish though because he chews on the railing and the paint chips off.
customer_reviews.author: Wessty

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product. I originally got a full size crib
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. I originally got a full size crib, but then discovered that my 4'10" granddaughter's mom was too short to reach in and pick her baby out of a full size crib even at the middle setting. But she has no trouble with this, and it is easy to move around, very sturdy, and rocks if you take the wheels off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little crib!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this crib to be able to accomodate our granddaughter when she visits. It's beautiful, and both my daughter and her baby loved it. It has a wonderful rocking feature, and you could rock the baby to sleep. The crib also fits through doors without having to fold or disassemble. We could carry it from the bedroom to the family room without a problem. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dimaria

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Looks cute.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for small spaces! We are yet to figure out how efficient this is going to be.
customer_reviews.author: Balaji

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for this Mom & our Church
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for our church's nursery. Never used the rocking feature, always kept the wheels on but they work amazingly well. A very nice smaller crib and super easy to wheel around from room to room (I've personally had to do this on many occasions for my 11 month old). Not one person in our church has any complaints! The only somewhat difficult thing I found was trying to find a mattress that fit & met the safety mattress height standards, we ended up going with the Davinci Crescent Mini Crib Universal Fit Waterproof 50-Coil Mattress with Border Wire which fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good crib for small places. Though one of the fixing screw hole was damaged
customer_reviews.author: Fedor/Aleksandra

customer_reviews.title: Crib is of excellent quality. I bought it for when my granddaughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Crib is of excellent quality. I bought it for when my granddaughter visits. It will also be used as a initial crib when my daughter who lives with me has a baby this February. The crib is small enough to be stored in my bedroom. It easily moves on it's coaster wheels. Another great feature is the height of the mattress is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cole

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: It stinks like hell, over a month of airing/use. Don't understand how it gets certifications when it clearly has very strong chemical smell. I have a suspicion that it gave my child an eczema...
customer_reviews.author: Concerned mother

customer_reviews.title: it works great for my master room
customer_reviews.text: I purchase the crib for when my granddaughter stays at my home, it works great for my master room. It's very well made, I would purchase a thicker pad to go with it because it comes with a very thin mattress. It fits thought the doorway of any room, and you can leave the wheels off for it to rock or if you use the wheels they do have a lock so it will stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great little crib
customer_reviews.text: Great little crib. A 16 month, 21 lbs, 31 inch child fits well with room to grow. Rocking feature is nice, wheels feature is nice. Bottom level is almost as deep as the regular sized crib. I had a hard time finding teething guard so I tied fleece fabric on top rail and the chewing stopped.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: The perfect crib for a newborn
customer_reviews.text: This crib was easy to assemble, of good quality and super cute! I purchased the dream on me 3 inch spring coil for mini cribs along with the American jersey sheets for mini crib mattresses. Everything fits perfect. I can imagine the advantages of having a rocking cradle in the first three months of my baby's life. The mattress support board will be lowered after three months and the wheels will be installed making it portable. I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Heroz

customer_reviews.title: Great for urban dwellers
customer_reviews.text: We bought this crib for our daughter because we were living in a one bedroom apartment and wanted a real crib. Though we cleared a section of our bedroom for the "nursery," we kept wheeling the crib everywhere in the apartment. It is sturdy enough to handle all that motion, and easy enough to adjust as necessary. Our daughter is 9 months old and in the 75th percentile for height, and she still fits great.
customer_reviews.author: EVF

customer_reviews.title: Mattress that it came with is a little thin. Make sure to buy a separate mattress.
customer_reviews.text: BEST Mini Crib ever! Very cute and beautiful natural color. I wish I had this with my first born!
customer_reviews.author: Pollyanna

customer_reviews.title: Mini crib
customer_reviews.text: As a new Grandmother I spent a good deal of time looking for the safest, most user friendly crib for visits and overnights. This is a well built, sturdy little crib which can easily be wheeled from room to room as needed. Since there are 4 levels Grandma doesn't have to strain to bend in two to place a sleeping baby down but it will,in months ahead, adjust for the the height of a toddler. (Why I didn't buy pack&plays). The suggested upgrade in mattress is a definite necessity and I would have been disappointed in the crib if not purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great size crib, just make sure bits not used!
customer_reviews.text: Overall the mini crib is great BUT, it looked like it was used before. There where dings and scratches on it. I was bummed when I noticed them. When I looked at it online b4 purchase I didn't see "used" or else I would have bought a new one! That's the only thing I'm dissatisfied about.
customer_reviews.author: MarilynNancy💖🌱🌵

customer_reviews.title: Good portable crib
customer_reviews.text: Good portable crib, came nicely packaged. The crib is just what I needed, rolls around easily through doorways and doesn't take up much space. I also purchased the Dream on me 3" spring coil mattress for it and fits perfectly. The one that comes with the crib was too thin to seem comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice quality crib especially for the price. It was very easy to assemble. The mattress they provide is really thin, so like other reviewers I went ahead and got a separate 3 inch mattress to use. I love the rocking feature and the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dont hesitate
customer_reviews.text: wish i had bough this before bub was born, she has had trouble adjusting. But it is a great crib that rocks and is sturdy. I know people have complained about the matress but I find all the baby matresses these days are hard. I bought another mattress as well and sent it back because there was no difference.
customer_reviews.author: mjc

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this crib to use as a cosleeper. We kept one side off, attached the wheels, secured it to our bed and use it as our co-sleeper. It's an awesome crib. I like how the wood is real wood, the baby enjoys rolling around while still enjoying easy access to mommy. Our son is 7 mo (adjusted age as he was a preemie) and still has plenty of room to grow in this crib. When we move this away from our bed and put the side on, it's going to make a nice mini crib. I love how it has a small footprint. I can still easily get out of bed in the morning. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: UrbanBlonde

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble (even at 32 weeks pregnant)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble (even at 32 weeks pregnant)! We love the color of the slate, not too dark. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great crib
customer_reviews.text: Well-built crib. It’s been handed down to my second daughter, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maroon Marti

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crib...
customer_reviews.text: This crib is one of the nicest piece of furnature I have bought for my grandson. I love the different levels to adjust the bed. It small enough to sit in my living room and I move it to my bedroom easily if he spends the night. Company had a fast delivery. Crib went together easily in an hour. Very Very nice....
customer_reviews.author: Janice Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bough this to replace a pack and play at our beach house. My son sleeps far better in this crib than the regular pack n play. Great for small spaces!
customer_reviews.author: Megan O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grandparent's home
customer_reviews.text: This mini crib has wheels so it can be rolled to different rooms as needed. We paired it with a 3" mattress from La Baby (which is a great, tight fit). I think the baby will out grow it around until 18 months, but this works great for our needs now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the crib
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the crib! It was easy to put together and seems like it will hold up just fine! I bought the Dream On Me Portable Mattress (not the spring coil one!) and it fits the crib perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this little affordable crib
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this little affordable crib, I really did. BUT The pressboard mattress support absolutely reeked of strong chemicals and was actually still sticky from the adhesives used. Gave me a headache just being near it and I’m not that sensitive to chemical smells. We replaced the support with one made of thin hardwood panel, an unwanted but necessary project in order for the crib to be useable. The rocking feature has a tendency to crush your toes underneath. Flimsy. Except for the compact size, an all around disappointing and poorly made crib. Bah
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Super cute perfect size :)
customer_reviews.text: So cute I love it !! Really easy to set up :)
customer_reviews.author: EdualynAndJuan

customer_reviews.title: One of the best choices out there
customer_reviews.text: This crib was perfect. I love that it has 4 height levels and can rock. It is very sturdy and well made. I got the "Dream On Me 3" Spring Coil Portable Crib Mattress" and it fit perfectly and snug against the side.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferandDarren

customer_reviews.title: Great crib
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, adjistable height for mattress as the kid grows, decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Donut

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy! Well made! 4 levels-not two!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! Hard to find porta crib that has 4 levels instead of two-like the majority of porta cribs sold. Perfect for a visiting baby or a bed to use in parents bedroom to have the baby close. Wheels with locks to roll from room to room. Loved it! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: sin.......s

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for our small apartment! doesn't take up a lot of space and is perfect for the baby
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: For large baby, you should buy a bigger crib.Always hit the head and move around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great portable mini crib
customer_reviews.text: This portable mini crib has been great for a large open floor plan. Easy to move it around, durable and easy to clean. Ide suggest an additional 3inch mattress for baby once able to role
customer_reviews.author: William belger

product_meta.title: Davinci Alpha Mini Rocking Crib in White, Removable Wheels, Greenguard Gold Certified
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Style:CribBe big in style and function with DaVinci's Alpha Mini Rocking Crib. With the wheels off, gently rock baby to bed right in the crib with Alpha Mini Crib's comforting, rocking feature. Rocking stops easily let you set your crib at a sturdy standstill.

With the wheels on, Moms and Dads can easily move Alpha around the home to keep baby nearby. With its space-saving size, Alpha Mini Rocking Crib comfortably fits through standard doorways.

With baby's safety in mind, Alpha is solidly built with a sturdy structure and strong slats.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
A is for Alpha. B is for Baby. C is for Crib. Let baby sleep in perfect peace with this cute crib from the Alpha Collection. We reengineered the rocking mini crib. It's a fusion of classic style and MDB safety. It's everything baby wants. And it's small enough to give you space for other things! It's Alpha for Baby.
feature_bullets: GREENGUARD Gold Certified: This product has been tested for over 10,000 chemicals! It contributes to cleaner indoor air, creating a healthier environment for your baby to sleep, play and grow

SPACE EFFICIENT: A mini crib is a great alternative for smaller spaces (such as parents' bedroom & smaller apartments) or to store at grandparents' house to make traveling back and forth easy for the whole family
PORTABLE: Rolling wheels allow you to move the crib around freely and to move aside to clean those hard to reach areas under the crib. Wheels can be locked to keep crib stationary
GROWS WITH BABY: 3 adjustable mattress positions that you can lower as your baby begins to sit and stand

FOR YOUR BABY'S SAFETY: Say goodbye to toxic chemicals! Finished in a non-toxic multi-step painting process and lead and phthalate safe. Rest assured knowing it exceeds ASTM International and U.S. CPSC safety standards
MATTRESS COMPATIBILITY: 1" waterproof pad (24"W x 38"L) included with purchase; for a best fit we recommend a standard mini crib-sized mattress

specifications.Material Type: New Zealand Pine Wood and TSCA compliant MDF
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars444 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
